${modID}:CoverFire.NAME: Cover Fire
${modID}:CoverFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals double damage to the target.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals triple damage to the target.

${modID}:DefenseAlgo.NAME: Defense Algorithm
${modID}:DefenseAlgo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and [E] for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:SelectTarget.NAME: Select Target
${modID}:SelectTarget.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply ${modID}:Target. NL If the enemy is already *Targeted gain !M! Vigor. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply ${modID}:Target. NL If the enemy is already *Targeted gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScorchedCore.NAME: Scorched Core
${modID}:ScorchedCore.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Melt into your hand.
${modID}:ScorchedCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Melt into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Gain !B! Block.
${modID}:ScorchedCore.FLAVOR: You shouldn't be able to read this.

${modID}:BurningPayload.NAME: Burning Payload
${modID}:BurningPayload.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add a *Melt to your hand and a copy of this card to your discard.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Add 2 copies of this card to your discard pile.
${modID}:BurningPayload.FLAVOR: You shouldn't be able to read this.

${modID}:CombustionRounds.NAME: Combustion Rounds
${modID}:CombustionRounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Artifact.
${modID}:CombustionRounds.FLAVOR: You shouldn't be able to read this.

${modID}:ThermalSurge.NAME: Thermal Surge
${modID}:ThermalSurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! card in your hand.
${modID}:ThermalSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust any card in your hand.
${modID}:ThermalSurge.FLAVOR: You shouldn't be able to read this.

${modID}:IgnitionProtocol.NAME: Ignition Protocol
${modID}:IgnitionProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies, Add a *Melt to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies
${modID}:IgnitionProtocol.FLAVOR: You shouldn't be able to read this.

${modID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${modID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Status is played or created, NL gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FeedbackLoop.NAME: Feedback Loop
${modID}:FeedbackLoop.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a Buff or Debuff, NL deal !M! damage.

${modID}:Flash.NAME: Flash
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength

${modID}:DataCache.NAME: Data Cache
${modID}:DataCache.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to half the energy spent since last use.
${modID}:DataCache.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the energy spent since last use.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the energy spent this combat.
Spent)

${modID}:Cryostasis.NAME: Cryostasis
${modID}:Cryostasis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next 3 turns.

${modID}:TakeCover.NAME: Take Cover
${modID}:TakeCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

${modID}:Beacon.NAME: Beacon
${modID}:Beacon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Add a random *Bastion card into your Discard Pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Add 2 random *Bastion cards into your Discard Pile.

${modID}:RedOptionOne.NAME: Demonic Fuel
${modID}:RedOptionOne.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:BlueOptionOne.NAME: Fortress Protocol
${modID}:BlueOptionOne.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your first !M! turn.

${modID}:YellowOptionTwo.NAME: Automated Refinement
${modID}:YellowOptionTwo.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade !M! random cards in your deck.

${modID}:ScrapCommon.NAME: Sharp Scrap
${modID}:ScrapCommon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Gain !M! Vigor, NL ${modID}:Fuse and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Heal 3 HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScrapCommonDef.NAME: Tough Scrap
${modID}:ScrapCommonDef.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Gain !M! Thorns, NL ${modID}:Fuse and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Heal 3 HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScrapCommonLeft.NAME: Common Leftovers

${modID}:ScrapUncommonAttStr.NAME: Strong Module
${modID}:ScrapUncommonAttStr.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Gain !M! Strength, NL  ${modID}:Fuse and Exhaust.

${modID}:ScrapUncommonDefDex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Gain !M! Dexterity, NL ${modID}:Fuse and Exhaust.

${modID}:ScrapUncommonLeft.NAME: Uncommon Leftovers
${modID}:ScrapUncommonLeft.DESCRIPTION: Permanently evolve a random uncommon card in your deck and all its copies. NL stslib:Fleeting.

${modID}:ScrapRareAtt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Gain !M! Ritual, NL ${modID}:Fuse and Exhaust.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Deal !D! Damage NL Gain 2 Temporary_HP. NL Whenever you play a *Trait card, return this to your Hand.

${modID}:NFT.NAME: NFT
${modID}:NFT.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! less Block for each *NFT you have during combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 15 gold for each *NFT in your deck.

${modID}:CrossedWires.NAME: Crossed Wires
${modID}:CrossedWires.DESCRIPTION: Counts as *Ignition, *Bastion, *Scavenge. NL Shuffle !M! random *Trait cards into your draw pile.
${modID}:CrossedWires.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Counts as *Ignition, *Bastion, *Scavenge. NL Shuffle !M! random Upgraded *Trait cards into your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Counts twice as *Ignition, *Bastion, *Scavenge. NL Shuffle !M! random Upgraded *Trait cards into your draw pile.

${modID}:FavorableTerrain.NAME: Favorable Terrain
${modID}:FavorableTerrain.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL *Inferno, *Bunker or *Junk *Pit. NL Add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FavorableTerrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL *Inferno+, *Bunker+ or *Junk *Pit+. NL Add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL *Inferno++, *Bunker++ or *Junk *Pit++. NL Add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TerrainRed.NAME: Inferno
${modID}:TerrainRed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Counts twice as *Ignition. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Counts twice as *Ignition. NL [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: Deal 15 Damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Exhaust.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Counts twice as *Scavenge. NL [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: Gain 30 Gold. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Exhaust.

${modID}:GachaPull.NAME: Gacha Pull
${modID}:GachaPull.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${modID}:COST! Gold to pick NL 1 of !M! rewards or drawbacks.

${modID}:GamblingCardReward.NAME: Card Reward
${modID}:GamblingCardReward.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 additional card to choose from next card reward.
${modID}:GamblingCardReward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain an extra card reward at the end of this combat.

${modID}:GamblingCreateScavenge.NAME: Scavenge
${modID}:GamblingCreateScavenge.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random ${modID}:Scavenge cards into your Draw Pile.

${modID}:GamblingGainCurse.NAME: Curse
${modID}:GamblingGainCurse.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Curse to your deck.

${modID}:GamblingNoBlock.NAME: No Block
${modID}:GamblingNoBlock.DESCRIPTION: You cannot gain Block from cards for the next 2 turns.

${modID}:GamblingUpgradeCards.NAME: Upgrades
${modID}:GamblingUpgradeCards.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade a basic Strike or Defend in your deck.
${modID}:GamblingUpgradeCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade a random card in your deck

${modID}:LockedIn.NAME: Locked In
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to Scry !${modID}:SCRY!.

${modID}:FlashDrive.NAME: Flash Drive
${modID}:FlashDrive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Play a Skill in your draw pile and add a Dazed into your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Play any card in your draw pile.

${modID}:TakeAim.NAME: Take Aim
${modID}:TakeAim.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Scry !M! then ${modID}:Charge !${modID}:CHARGE! for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ComboBreaker.NAME: Combo Breaker
${modID}:ComboBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Double this card's ${modID}:Charge.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Triple this card's ${modID}:Charge.

${modID}:Thrusters.NAME: Thrusters
${modID}:Thrusters.DESCRIPTION: Scry !${modID}:SCRY!. NL ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL Gain [E] . NL Next turn, Lose [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Scry !${modID}:SCRY!. NL ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL Gain [E] .

${modID}:VolatileBattery.NAME: Volatile Battery
${modID}:VolatileBattery.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charge !M! for each copy in your deck. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charge !M! for each copy in your deck. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Ejected[]: Add 2 copies of this card to your discard pile.

${modID}:Maintenance.NAME: Maintenance
${modID}:Maintenance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to repeat.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, Gain [E] . NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to ${modID}:Charge !M! for each [E] spent this turn.
${modID}:Acceleration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, Gain [E] [E] . NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to ${modID}:Charge !M! for each [E] spent this turn.

Spent)

${modID}:TitaniumCasing.NAME: Titanium Casing
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Triple your ${modID}:Capacity and Block.

${modID}:EnergyBurst.NAME: Energy Burst
${modID}:EnergyBurst.DESCRIPTION: Every time you shuffle your draw pile, ${modID}:Charge equal to half your deck size.
${modID}:EnergyBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you shuffle your draw pile, ${modID}:Charge equal to your deck size.

${modID}:DoubleOrNothing.NAME: Double Or Nothing
${modID}:DoubleOrNothing.DESCRIPTION: Lose half your Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: ${modID}:Charge equal to half your current ${modID}:Charge.
${modID}:DoubleOrNothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all your Block. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Double your ${modID}:Charge.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Triple your ${modID}:Charge.

${modID}:Reload.NAME: Reload
${modID}:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to play a card from your discard pile.

${modID}:ExposedWire.NAME: Exposed Wire
${modID}:ExposedWire.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
${modID}:ExposedWire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity.

${modID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${modID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an [#03befc]Ejected[] effect is triggered, Gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Virus.NAME: Virus
${modID}:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Gain Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

${modID}:DefenseMatrix.NAME: Defense Matrix
${modID}:DefenseMatrix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to Gain Block equal to half your ${modID}:Charge.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Capacity. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Discard 1 card to Gain Block equal to twice your ${modID}:Charge.

${modID}:PowerSlide.NAME: Power Slide
${modID}:PowerSlide.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: ${modID}:Charge !M!. NL [#03befc]Scry[]: Return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Heal !M! HP.

${modID}:Grenades.NAME: Grenades
${modID}:Grenades.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 2 turns deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of 2 turns deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and double this card's damage.

${modID}:InstructionManual.NAME: Instruction Manual

${modID}:GrapplingHook.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Equipped[], ${modID}:[#03befc]Unequipped[]: NL Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played was an Attack, gain [E].

${modID}:FireSupport.DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Apply[] ${modID}:[#03befc]Target[], [#03befc]Scry[]: NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Discard[]: NL ${modID}:Repair !M! durability.

${modID}:RustyBlade.NAME: Rusty Blade

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Equipped[], [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]Start[], [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to missing durability.

${modID}:EnergyChamber.NAME: Energy Chamber
${modID}:EnergyChamber.DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Take[], [#03befc]Block[] [#03befc]Damage[]: NL Increase this card's damage by !M!. NL ${modID}:[#03befc]Unequipped[]: NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Drill.NAME: Drill
${modID}:Drill.DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: Gain !M! Gold. NL [#03befc]Combat[] [#03befc]End[]: Add a *Scrap to your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: Gain !M! Gold. NL Gain 9 Temporary_HP.

${modID}:RocketPunch.NAME: Rocket Punch
${modID}:RocketPunch.DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]Start[]: NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]Start[]: NL Gain !M! Strength. NL [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SelfDestruct.NAME: Self Destruct
${modID}:SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:[#03befc]Echo[]: Exhaust any ${modID}:Equipment in hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each one. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EMPGrenade.NAME: EMP Grenade
${modID}:EMPGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals an additional !M! damage for each ${modID}:Equipment in hand.

${modID}:EvolutionOneA.NAME: Boot: Pacifist
${modID}:EvolutionOneA.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, Gain 9 Temporary_HP.

${modID}:EvolutionOneB.NAME: Boot: Hoarder
${modID}:EvolutionOneB.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, Shuffle 2 *Miracle+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:EvolutionOneC.NAME: Boot: Berserker
${modID}:EvolutionOneC.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, Gain 3 Strength for that turn.

${modID}:EvolutionTwoA.NAME: Directive: Stockpile
${modID}:EvolutionTwoA.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Gain 1 Block for every 2 cards in your hand.

${modID}:EvolutionTwoB.NAME: Directive: Maintenance
${modID}:EvolutionTwoB.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ${modID}:Repair 1 durability to a random ${modID}:Equipment in your hand.

${modID}:EvolutionTwoC.NAME: Directive: Arms Race
${modID}:EvolutionTwoC.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Gain 1 strength. (up to 3 times)

${modID}:EvolutionThreeB.NAME: Node: Power Supply
${modID}:EvolutionThreeB.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of your first 2 turns.

${modID}:EvolutionThreeC.NAME: Node: Processing Unit
${modID}:EvolutionThreeC.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use the Scry button, Scry 1 additional card.
